field.name: summary
field.value: Enhance ILogger interface to remove ambiguity

field.name: description
field.value:
Enable a new format on ILogger interface, with 6 overloads for each method:
Debug(string) Debug(string, Exception) DebugFormat(string, params object[]) DebugFormat(Exception, string, params object[]) DebugFormat(IFormatProvider, string, params object[]) DebugFormat(IFormatProvider, Exception, string, params object[])
Mark the following as obsolete: [Obsolete] Debug(string, params object[])
Do not forget to update log4net and NLog integration as well.
